titles.title: Recognizing the 40th anniversary of the independence of the Bahamas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/30/2013--Introduced. Joins the people of the Bahamas and the Bahamian diaspora worldwide in commemorating the 40th anniversary of the independence of the Bahamas. Recognizes that the United States and the Bahamas are united by a shared history, common values, and a commitment to democracy and human rights.
